item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...

item.title: Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air
item.description:
Photos of Various Food Dishes Flying Through the Air

Camden, London-based commercial still life photographer Piotr Gregorczyk likes to play with food and gravity. One concept he has focused on for a number of recent projects is the idea of showing various food dishes flying through the air as they come together on a plate or in a bowl.

item.title: The Most Beautiful Mountains in the World
item.description:
The Most Beautiful Mountains in the World

Because the odds are slim we'll ever strap on a pair of crampons and/or buy a "Teamwork" Successories poster, we thought it'd be…

item.title: My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away
item.description:
My Perfect 24 Hours, If I Were a Teleporting Billionaire | Travel Away

Bear with me on this one. Let's say it's summer, end of August to be more precise. I live in Romania, I am a billionaire, and, of course, teleportation is possible. To make it easier for you to calculate (if you want to), use the Eastern European time (UTC+2).

item.title: Five Four + Marvel Collection
item.description:
Five Four + Marvel Collection

Some comic book apparel can end up juvenile, but the new Five Four collaboration with Marvel is anything but. In celebration of the impending release of Avengers: Age of Ultron, the Five Four subscription menswear service finds subtlety in the generally loud graphic medium by using Marvel's famous roster of superheroes to inspire its April capsule.

item.title: Apple Challenges Government Demand To Crack Drug Dealer's iPhone In New York
item.description:
Apple Challenges Government Demand To Crack Drug Dealer's iPhone In New York

Apple has formally challenged the U.S. Department of Justice over another locked iPhone and the encrypted information it contains. Owned by an accused methamphetamine distributor in Brooklyn, the iPhone 5s is believed to contain evidence of a drug conspiracy, investigators said. The government claims that its technicians can't penetrate the locked iPhone and require Apple's help to get inside.
